summary: Adds Lincoln\'s Tophat to the Winking Skeever Inn, hat model by gulpy on reddit.
descriptionHtml:
Install: Simply extract the zip into your data directory, and enable LincolnsTophat.esp in the loader.

Location: The cloth tophat is on the small table between 2 doors on the upper level of The Winking Skeever in Solitude. The heavy armor version is on one of the chairs and the light armor version is on the bottom level of the bookshelf.

Model and textures by \'gulpy\' on reddit.
Import and implementation by MyFirstPony.
author: My_First_Pony and gulpy
